summary: The diff only updates project_state.json metadata without implementing any deployment changes, GameCard modifications, or video trailer functionality. All requirements from REQ-1 are missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the current Draft Version 4 implementation to the Internet Computer mainnet

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement click-to-play video trailers that do not autoplay
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to video player components, event handlers, or autoplay prevention logic are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all existing functionality works correctly on live deployment
missing_requirements.reason: No testing, validation, or deployment verification changes are present. Only metadata tracking was added.
